page.description: Make the user a member of the group in the currently connected database or server.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = AddUserGroup(UserName as C, GroupName as C)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The SQL::Connection::AddUserToGroup() method makes UserName a member of the GroupName in the currently connected database or server.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='SQLServer', Server='doc3000', Trusted_connection=yes, Database='Northwind'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.AddUserToGroup("Edward", "Techwriting") ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
